short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool for formatting json data, into a pretty human readable format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The JSON Formatter & Validator helps debugging JSON data by formatting and validating JSON data so that it is easily read by human beings.

Provides multiple tools including Cloud YUI Compressor, Closure Compiler, JS Encode/Decode, Find keyboard code, Color Picker, Diff Tools... and more.
